title: Guild Trainer
name: Freya
summary: The Guild Trainer, a seasoned warrior with a keen eye for talent, stands ready to mold raw recruits into formidable fighters. Her no-nonsense approach and battle-hardened expertise make her an invaluable asset to the guild.
history: Rising through the ranks with unparalleled skill, the Guild Trainer earned her position through countless battles and a reputation for turning even the most hopeless cases into capable warriors. Her methods are tough but effective, born from hard-won experience.
notes: Carries a large axe over her shoulder
Has a scar across her left cheek
